parameters.jsCode:
// Parse Callbell webhook payload                                                                                                                                                                                                           
  const body = $json.body || $json;                                                                                                                                                                                                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
  // üÜï SOPORTE PARA FORMATO REAL DE CALLBELL                                                                                                                                                                                                 
  // Callbell env√≠a: { event: "message_created", payload: { ... } }                                                                                                                                                                           
  const isCallbellFormat = body.event && body.payload;                                                                                                                                                                                        
  const message = isCallbellFormat ? body.payload : body;                                                                                                                                                                                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
  // Extraer datos del mensaje                                                                                                                                                                                                                
  const uuid = message.uuid || message.message?.uuid || '';                                                                                                                                                                                   
  const from = message.from || message.message?.from || '';                                                                                                                                                                                   
  const to = message.to || message.message?.to || '';                                                                                                                                                                                         
  const text = message.text || message.message?.text || message.content?.text || '';                                                                                                                                                          
  const status = message.status || message.message?.status || 'unknown';                                                                                                                                                                      
  const createdAt = message.createdAt || message.message?.createdAt || Date.now();                                                                                                                                                            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
  // üÜï Extraer tags del contacto (desde Callbell)                                                                                                                                                                                            
  const tags = message.contact?.tags || message.tags || [];                                                                                                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
  // üÜï Extraer contact_id (UUID del contacto en Callbell)                                                                                                                                                                                    
  const contactId = message.contact?.uuid || '';                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
  // üÜï Extraer conversationHref (Link de la conversaci√≥n en Callbell)                                                                                                                                                                        
  const conversationHref = message.contact?.conversationHref || '';                                                                                                                                                                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
  // Determinar direcci√≥n                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
  const direction = from === '573105879824' ? 'outbound' : 'inbound';                                                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
  // Normalizar phone                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
  let phone = direction === 'inbound' ? from : to;                                                                                                                                                                                            
  phone = phone.replace(/[^0-9]/g, '');                                                                                                                                                                                                       
  if (phone.startsWith('57')) {                                                                                                                                                                                                               
    phone = phone;                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
  } else if (phone.startsWith('3')) {                                                                                                                                                                                                         
    phone = '57' + phone;                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
  }                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
  console.log('üì• WEBHOOK RECEIVED:', {                                                                                                                                                                                                       
    format: isCallbellFormat ? 'callbell' : 'test',                                                                                                                                                                                           
    uuid,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
    phone,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
    direction,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    text: text.substring(0, 50),                                                                                                                                                                                                              
    tags: tags,                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
    contact_id: contactId,                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
    conversation_href: conversationHref                                                                                                                                                                                                       
  });                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
  return {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
    callbell_message_id: uuid,                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    phone,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
    contact_id: contactId,                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
    conversation_href: conversationHref,                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    direction,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    content: text,                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
    status,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
    tags: tags,                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
    created_at: new Date(createdAt).toISOString()                                                                                                                                                                                             
  };

parameters.query: SELECT session_id, state, contact_id, tags, mode FROM sessions_v3 WHERE phone = '{{ $json.phone }}' LIMIT 1

parameters.jsCode:
// Session doesn't exist - create new                                                                                                                                                                                                       
  const parsePayload = $node['Parse Payload'].json;                                                                                                                                                                                           
  const sessionId = `session_${parsePayload.phone}_${Date.now()}`;                                                                                                                                                                            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
  // üÜï Usar tags del webhook                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
  const newTags = parsePayload.tags || [];                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
  console.log('üÜï Creating new session:', sessionId);                                                                                                                                                                                         
  console.log('üè∑Ô∏è Initial tags:', newTags);                                                                                                                                                                                                   
  console.log('üîó Conversation href:', parsePayload.conversation_href);                                                                                                                                                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
  return {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
    session_id: sessionId,                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
    phone: parsePayload.phone,                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    contact_id: parsePayload.contact_id || '',                                                                                                                                                                                                
    callbell_conversation_href: parsePayload.conversation_href || '',  // ‚¨ÖÔ∏è CAMBIO: columna directa, no en state                                                                                                                             
    state: {},  // ‚¨ÖÔ∏è CAMBIO: state vac√≠o                                                                                                                                                                                                     
    tags: newTags,                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
    mode: 'conversacion',                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
    message: {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      callbell_message_id: parsePayload.callbell_message_id,                                                                                                                                                                                  
      content: parsePayload.content,                                                                                                                                                                                                          
      direction: parsePayload.direction,                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      created_at: parsePayload.created_at                                                                                                                                                                                                     
    }                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
  };

parameters.query:
INSERT INTO sessions_v3 (                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
    session_id,                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
    phone,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
    contact_id,                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
    callbell_conversation_href,                                                                                                                                                                                                               
    state,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
    tags,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
    mode,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
    status,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
    created_at,                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
    last_activity                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
  )                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
  VALUES (                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
    '{{ $json.session_id }}',                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
    '{{ $json.phone }}',                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    '{{ $json.contact_id || "" }}',                                                                                                                                                                                                           
    '{{ $json.callbell_conversation_href || "" }}',                                                                                                                                                                                           
    '{{ JSON.stringify($json.state) }}'::jsonb,                                                                                                                                                                                               
    '{{ $json.tags && $json.tags.length > 0 ? "{\"" + $json.tags.join("\",\"") + "\"}" : "{}" }}'::text[],                                                                                                                                    
    '{{ $json.mode }}',                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
    'active',                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
    NOW(),                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
    NOW()                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
  )                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
  RETURNING *

INSERT INTO messages_v3 (session_id, role, content, direction, callbell_message_id, business_id, payload_raw, created_at)
  VALUES (
    '{{ $json.session_id }}',
    '{{ $json.message.direction === "inbound" ? "user" : "assistant" }}',
    '{{ $json.message.content }}',
    '{{ $json.message.direction }}',
    '{{ $json.message.callbell_message_id }}',
    'somnio',
    '{}'::jsonb,
    '{{ $json.message.created_at }}'::timestamp
  )
  ON CONFLICT (callbell_message_id) DO NOTHING
  RETURNING id

UPDATE sessions_v3
  SET state = '{{ JSON.stringify($json.captured_data) }}'::jsonb,
      mode = '{{ $json.final_mode }}',
      last_activity = NOW()
  WHERE phone = '{{ $json.phone }}'
  RETURNING *

UPDATE sessions_v3                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
  SET state = '{{ JSON.stringify($json.updated_state) }}'::jsonb                                                                                                                                                                              
  WHERE phone = '{{ $json.phone }}'                                                                                                                                                                                                           
  RETURNING *

SELECT
    m.id,
    m.role,
    m.content,
    m.direction,
    m.created_at,
    s.session_id,
    s.phone,
    s.state as captured_data
  FROM messages_v3 m
  JOIN sessions_v3 s ON m.session_id = s.session_id
  WHERE s.phone = '{{ $node["Parse Payload"].json.phone }}'
  ORDER BY m.created_at ASC

UPDATE sessions_v3
  SET
    state = COALESCE(
      state::jsonb || '{{ JSON.stringify($json.captured_data) }}'::jsonb,
      '{{ JSON.stringify($json.captured_data) }}'::jsonb
    ),
    mode = COALESCE(NULLIF('{{ $json.new_mode }}', 'null'), mode),
    last_activity = NOW()
  WHERE phone = '{{ $json.phone }}'
  RETURNING *

nodes.name: Update Session with State Analyzer Results

parameters.jsCode:
// Verificar tags bloqueados y mensajes duplicados                                                                                                                                                                                          
  const payload = $json;                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
  const tags = payload.tags || [];                                                                                                                                                                                                            
  const callbellMessageId = payload.callbell_message_id;                                                                                                                                                                                      
  const createdAt = payload.created_at;                                                                                                                                                                                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
  // 1. VERIFICAR TAGS BLOQUEADOS                                                                                                                                                                                                             
  const blockedTags = ['WPP', 'P/W', 'RECO', 'bot_off'];                                                                                                                                                                                      
  const hasBlockedTag = tags.some(tag => blockedTags.includes(tag));                                                                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
  console.log('üè∑Ô∏è CHECKING TAGS:', {                                                                                                                                                                                                          
    phone: payload.phone,                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
    tags: tags,                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
    hasBlockedTag: hasBlockedTag                                                                                                                                                                                                              
  });                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
  // 2. VERIFICAR SI ES MENSAJE ANTIGUO (m√°s de 2 minutos)                                                                                                                                                                                    
  const messageTimestamp = new Date(createdAt).getTime();                                                                                                                                                                                     
  const now = Date.now();                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
  const ageInSeconds = (now - messageTimestamp) / 1000;                                                                                                                                                                                       
  const isOldMessage = ageInSeconds > 120; // M√°s de 2 minutos                                                                                                                                                                                
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
  console.log('‚è∞ CHECKING MESSAGE AGE:', {                                                                                                                                                                                                   
    phone: payload.phone,                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
    age_seconds: ageInSeconds.toFixed(1),                                                                                                                                                                                                     
    is_old: isOldMessage                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
  });                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
  // 3. VERIFICAR SI YA EXISTE EN BD (duplicado)                                                                                                                                                                                              
  // Esto se verificar√° en el siguiente nodo con una query                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
  return {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
    ...payload,                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
    has_blocked_tag: hasBlockedTag,                                                                                                                                                                                                           
    is_old_message: isOldMessage,                                                                                                                                                                                                             
    message_age_seconds: ageInSeconds,                                                                                                                                                                                                        
    should_block: hasBlockedTag || isOldMessage                                                                                                                                                                                               
  };

// FORZAR lectura del nodo Call Order Manager (no usar $json)                                                                                                                                                                               
  let orderData = $node['Call Order Manager'].json;                                                                                                                                                                                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
  // Si es un array, tomar el primer elemento                                                                                                                                                                                                 
  if (Array.isArray(orderData)) {                                                                                                                                                                                                             
    orderData = orderData[0];                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
  }                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
  const shouldCreate = $node['Should Create Order?'].json;                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
  console.log('=== DEBUG - VERIFICANDO FUENTE DE DATOS ===');                                                                                                                                                                                 
  console.log('Datos de Call Order Manager:', JSON.stringify(orderData, null, 2));                                                                                                                                                            
  console.log('Order URL extra√≠da:', orderData?.bigin_response?.data?.orderUrl);                                                                                                                                                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
  // Extraer datos de la estructura correcta                                                                                                                                                                                                  
  let ordenName = '';                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
  let orderUrl = '';                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
  let orderId = '';                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
  if (orderData.bigin_response?.data) {                                                                                                                                                                                                       
    ordenName = orderData.bigin_response.data.ordenName;                                                                                                                                                                                      
    orderUrl = orderData.bigin_response.data.orderUrl;                                                                                                                                                                                        
    orderId = orderData.bigin_response.data.orderId;                                                                                                                                                                                          
  } else if (orderData.data) {                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    ordenName = orderData.data.ordenName;                                                                                                                                                                                                     
    orderUrl = orderData.data.orderUrl;                                                                                                                                                                                                       
    orderId = orderData.data.orderId;                                                                                                                                                                                                         
  }                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
  // Fallback al state si no hay ordenName                                                                                                                                                                                                    
  if (!ordenName && shouldCreate.state) {                                                                                                                                                                                                     
    ordenName = `${shouldCreate.state.nombre || ''} ${shouldCreate.state.apellido || ''}`.trim();                                                                                                                                             
  }                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
  console.log('=== DATOS FINALES A ENVIAR ===');                                                                                                                                                                                              
  console.log('ordenName:', ordenName);                                                                                                                                                                                                       
  console.log('orderUrl:', orderUrl);                                                                                                                                                                                                         
  console.log('orderId:', orderId);                                                                                                                                                                                                           
  console.log('contact_id:', shouldCreate.contact_id);                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
  return {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
    contact_id: shouldCreate.contact_id,                                                                                                                                                                                                      
    phone: shouldCreate.phone,                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    name: ordenName || 'Sin nombre',                                                                                                                                                                                                          
    orderUrl: orderUrl || '',                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
    orderId: orderId || '',                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
    tags: ["WPP", "RB"]                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
  };

main.node: Update Session with State Analyzer Results
